//Prim's
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<utility>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string str;
	int t,n,p,q,i,j,num;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		vector<int> freq(26,0);
		cin>>str;
		scanf("%d%d",&p,&q);
		int len=str.length();
		for(i=0;i<len;i++)
		{
			freq[str[i]-97]++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
			freq[i]*=p;
		for(i=1;i<26;i++)
			freq[i]+=freq[i-1];
		while(q--)
		{
			scanf("%d",&num);
			int idx=lower_bound(freq.begin(),freq.end(),num)-freq.begin();
			if(idx==26)
				printf("-1\n");
			else
				printf("%c\n",97+idx);
		}
	}
    return 0;
}
